oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-03-19 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 19, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Jim Reeves (host/performer), guest performer Roy Drusky, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Jimmie Selph, Chet Atkins, Archie Campbell, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1067th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Archie Campbell; Chet Atkins; Ernest Tubb; Roy Drusky; Del Wood; Jim Reeves
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Jim Reeves introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Jim Reeves, Chet Atkins) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Ernest Tubb) (recording) -- Jim Reeves introduces Roy Drusky -- Just About That Time (Roy Drusky) -- Jim Reeves introduces Del Wood -- Waiting For The Robert E. Lee (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Jim Reeves announce his tour schedule -- Jim Reeves -- He'll Have To Go (Jim Reeves) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Jim Reeves) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Jordanaires (Musical group); Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Selph, Jimmy; Reeves, Jim; Drusky, Roy; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984
